title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedder inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting, managing models, and monitoring Ollama from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for private local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental fork adding NVIDIA TensorRT-LLM backend for faster inference on RTX GPUs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and notes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official lightweight C# SDK maintained by the Ollama team; chat, generate, and embed APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with per-channel model configs.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Official example showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B with LoRA and serve it via Ollama.
